text: The 2019 European Athletics U20 Championships were the 25th edition of the biennial European U20 athletics championships. They were held in Borås, Sweden from 18 July to 21 July. ==Medal summary== ===Men=== ====Track==== {| |- |100 metres |Lorenzo Paissan || 10.44 |Antoni Plichta || 10.52 |Chad Miller || 10.53 |- |200
